title: Villa - Plastering Works
description: Specialist in applying plaster and finishing to walls and ceilings in villas. Includes improving surface quality and preparing it for painting or final finishes.

title: Ground Floor - Concrete Works
description: Specialist in concrete work for ground floors. Includes overseeing concrete pouring and applying appropriate design techniques.

title: Apartment - Plumbing Works
description: Expert in installing and maintaining plumbing systems in apartments. Includes working on pipe installations, water connections, and sewage systems.

title: Repeated Floors - Concrete Works
description: Responsible for concrete work on repeated floors. Includes designing and executing concrete layers for multiple floors according to engineering specifications.

title: House - Masonry Works
description: Expert in working with bricks, stones, and blocks in houses. Includes building walls, arches, and other masonry structures using various materials.

title: Tank - Concrete Works
description: Specialist in designing and executing concrete for tanks. Includes ensuring tanks are resistant to leakage and wear using specialized concrete techniques.

title: Property Sale Consultant
description: Provides consulting for clients looking to sell properties. Includes offering advice on property valuation and sales procedures.

title: Property Purchase Consultant
description: Offers consulting for potential buyers. Includes assisting clients in finding suitable properties and providing advice on purchase processes.

title: Construction and Renovation Consultant
description: Provides consulting for construction and renovation projects. Includes offering recommendations on design, project planning, and construction management.
